None.Name: Fire Stream
None.Description: Unit releases a fiery stream that deals 300 damage to enemies every second.

None.Name: Burning Liquid
None.Description: Activate to spread 8 waves of burning liquid on the ground that inflicts damage 8 times. Each time 80 damage is dealt to enemies in a 25m radius around the target, up to 480 in total per second. Reusable every 30 seconds.
